Html:
Can someone kindly point me to the URL where I can find the data dictionary for the AdventureWorks2008 OLTP database?

I have already searched this discussion forum, as well as the Help system within SQL Server 2008, and all search results point to the 2005 version.

Thanks in advance for any help.

There is not a published data dictionary for AdventureWorks2008 at this time. The existing documentation for it is here: http://www.codeplex.com/MSFTDBProdSamples/Wiki/View.aspx?title=AW2008Details&referringTitle=Home

The schema diagrams are here: http://www.codeplex.com/MSFTDBProdSamples/Wiki/View.aspx?title=AWSchemaDiag&referringTitle=Home

Thanks for the links.  However, I have already reviewed the info at these links.

Given that there are 9 new tables in AdventureWorks2008 (BusinessEntity, BusinessEntityAddress, BusinessEntityContact, EmailAddress, Password, Person, PersonPhone, PhoneNumberType, and PersonCreditCard), an updated data dictionary would be helpful.

Do you know if a data dictionary for AdventureWorks2008 will ever be published, and if so, when?

Thanks again.

That's a great question, emerald77. There are currently no plans to publish a data dictionary for AdventureWorks2008; however, my team "owns" AdventureWorks and the ammunition that will convince management to task us with it will come from new Work Items that get a large number of votes from the community: http://www.codeplex.com/SqlServerSamples/WorkItem/Create.aspx
